product.name: Crew Neck Stay Tucked
product.subtitle: Undershirt
product.description:
This undershirt is the ultimate replacement to your current “box cut” short sleeve undershirts that give you EFG excess fabric gut and BMT billowy muffin top.

Once you pull this undershirt down, it will stay in place by hugging your lower body. It will not ride up, bunch up, or come untucked....ever. You'll wonder how you ever lived without this undershirt.

Fabric: 90% Non-Pilling Micro Modal 10% Spandex fabric glossary
